name: Women's 'RubySet TorsoRig' Body Augmentation
description:
Released to support the efforts of CONCORD and core empire efforts to maintain planetary security in the face of Triglavian Invasions, the RubySet TorsoRig is a powerful enhancement of upper body strength, speed and precision.

A new offering from Wiyrkomi Industrial Biomechanics, the RubySet TorsoRig is a general purpose body augmentation believed to derive from combat rigs worn by troops of the Wiyrkomi Peace Corps.

The science and technology of enhancing biomechanics using cybernetic rigs and meshes is advancing all the time with much effort focused on lowering the barrier of entry in terms of manufacturing and resources that make up the cost of such powerful augmentations.
